message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90, and you get 10.  Let's see if you're willing to negotiate!

Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  The value of the money decreases for both of us each round, so a fair agreement now is in both our best interests.

Okay, I see we're both willing to negotiate. I'm willing to budge to a 45/55 split.  This is closer to your proposal, but I need to be able to get at least a bit more than 30 to make this worthwhile.  What do you say?
